```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
homicides <- read.csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r}
homicides <- homicides %>% 
  mutate(reported_date = ymd(reported_date)) %>% 
  mutate(MonthYear = format(as.Date(reported_date), "%m-%y"))

balt_homs <- homicides %>% 
  unite("Location", city:state, sep=", ") %>% 
  filter(Location == "Baltimore, MD")
```
